job description:
The Scientist will be responsible for providing support to Discovery.

  • Target evaluation, cell-based assays, model development and data analysis.
  • Develop ideas leading to new experimentation, coordinating technical activities and participating in group and project meetings.

Basic Qualifications:

  • 1+ years of experience in a laboratory setting or bio-tech organization
  • Flow cytometry experience
  • Cell culture experience
  • Experience in culturing immune cell subsets and profiling phenotypic changes upon drug treatment using flow cytometry, ELISA, Luminex, qPCR, etc.
  • Experience with Graph Pad Prism, Facsdiva, Flowjo, Fcsexpress, etc.
  • Master’s degree from an accredited university

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Degree in Immunology
  • Experience in Immunology
